price: دا هغه كسان دي چې د هغوى لپاره بد عذاب دى او همدوى به په آخرت كې ډېر تاوانيان وي.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna lahum sūu al-ʿadhābi wahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
